titlestmt.author: Archives Service Center graduate students.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-06-11 09:50:18 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: University of Pittsburgh Archives Photograph Collection
did.abstract: These are photographs from various sources documenting University people, events and places taken by University of Pittsburgh photographers.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These photographs have been deposited by several University offices including the University Times, Student Affairs, Public Affairs and CIDDE.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: All rights reserved. University of Pittsburgh.

odd.head: Previous Citation
odd.p: University of Pittsburgh Archives Photograph Collection, 1810-2006, UA.Photos, University Archives, Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University of Pittsburgh Archives Photograph Collection, 1810-2006, UA.Photos, University Archives, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was processed by archives' students throughout 2012.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This is a collection of photographs gathered from several University offices and sources between 2007-2011. The photographs are of various, buildings, events, and people affiliated with the University taken between 1880-2006. Painted portraits of University officials bear their original creation date though were photographed in the twentieth century.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Additional photographs are expected to be added to the collection on an ongoing basis as they are deposited.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: University Archives Information Files, University Archives, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: There is no specific arrangement to the photographs.
